price: Dan kaummu mendustakannya (azab)314) padahal (azab) itu benar adanya. Katakanlah (Muhammad), "Aku ini bukanlah penanggung jawab kamu."
arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمُكَ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ قُل لَّسۡتُ عَلَيۡكُم بِوَكِيلٖ
footnotes: *314) Sebagian mufasir mengatakan bahwa yang didustakan itu ialah Al-Qur`an.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakadhaba bihi qawmuka wahuwa al-ḥaqu qul lastu ʿalaykum biwakīlin
